task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 54°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the entire building to estimate its height, but the top is currently cut off, so I will tilt my view upwards.
I have seen the top of the building, and now I need to see the base to get a full view for my height estimation, so I will tilt my view downwards.

I have now seen the top and the bottom of the building; the structure appears to be about 5-6 stories tall, and assuming a standard floor height of 3-4 meters, I estimate the total height to be around 20 meters.
